page.title: 13VILLAGERS (CONTINUED)
page.content: He has now retired but still repairs his old cars for a hobby. Mr.Prosser likes boating and yachting.A lot of people like going bike riding and going for long walks in the summer. Most of the houses are very old and mostly rented from the Guise family. Most have good neighbours and give each other advice if they need it . They do not get many visitors in the area of Elmore but they get more sightseers than anything. The people that live in the area have to get used to the country smells even if they do not like them. They have heard more comments about the smell from people out cycling and pedestrians having a nice walk. Some people go down to the canal catching elvers.
